message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking for $9500 for it. Would you like to make an offer or accept my price?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of something a bit more in the range of $8000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $9000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $9000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9000. Would you be willing to consider $8200?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I can do $9200, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $9200?
I'm still not quite there, Alice. I'd be willing to meet you at $8500, but I think that's as low as I can go. Can you consider that?
